title: How to put my Bluetooth in pairing mode - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on the device you’re trying to pair. On the phone or tablet, you have to go to the settings and look at the Bluetooth section. There will be a place to activate a scan for new devices, so start there. On the device itself, typically you’ll press and hold the power on button for ~10 seconds to enter pairing mode, at which point the phone or tablet will detect the device and begin the pairing process. But read your device’s manual for the specifics on pairing; many devices use a different sequence.
